Actions.description: The available actions for this Resource.
Actions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available actions for this Resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.description: The available OEM-specific actions for this Resource.
Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this Resource.

Mapping.description: The mapping between a Resource type and the relevant privileges that accesses the Resource.
Mapping.longDescription: This type shall describe a mapping between a Resource type and the relevant privileges that accesses the Resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Entity.longDescription: This property shall contain the Resource name, such as `Manager`.

OperationMap.description: List mapping between HTTP methods and privilege required for the Resource.
OperationMap.longDescription: This property shall list the mapping between HTTP methods and the privilege required for the Resource.

PropertyOverrides.description: The privilege overrides of properties within a Resource.
PropertyOverrides.longDescription: This property shall contain the privilege overrides of properties, such as the `Password` property in the `ManagerAccount` Resource.

ResourceURIOverrides.description: The privilege overrides of Resource URIs.
ResourceURIOverrides.longDescription: This property shall contain the privilege overrides of Resource URIs.  The target lists the Resource URI and the new privileges.

SubordinateOverrides.description: The privilege overrides of the subordinate Resource.
SubordinateOverrides.longDescription: This property shall contain the privilege overrides of the subordinate Resource.  The target lists are identified by Resource type.

OemActions.description: The available OEM-specific actions for this Resource.
OemActions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this Resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

OperationMap.description: The specific privileges required to complete a set of HTTP operations.
OperationMap.longDescription: This type shall describe the specific privileges required to complete a set of HTTP operations.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

DELETE.description: The privilege required to complete an HTTP DELETE operation.
DELETE.longDescription: This property shall contain the privilege required to complete an HTTP DELETE operation.

GET.description: The privilege required to complete an HTTP GET operation.
GET.longDescription: This property shall contain the privilege required to complete an HTTP GET operation.

HEAD.description: The privilege required to complete an HTTP HEAD operation.
HEAD.longDescription: This property shall contain the privilege required to complete an HTTP HEAD operation.

PATCH.description: The privilege required to complete an HTTP PATCH operation.
PATCH.longDescription: This property shall contain the privilege required to complete an HTTP PATCH operation.

POST.description: The privilege required to complete an HTTP POST operation.
POST.longDescription: This property shall contain the privilege required to complete an HTTP POST operation.

PUT.description: The privilege required to complete an HTTP PUT operation.
PUT.longDescription: This property shall contain the privilege required to complete an HTTP PUT operation.

OperationPrivilege.description: The privileges for a specific HTTP operation.
OperationPrivilege.longDescription: This type shall describe the privileges required to complete a specific HTTP operation.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Privilege.description: An array of privileges that are required to complete a specific HTTP operation on a Resource.
Privilege.longDescription: This array shall contain an array of privileges that are required to complete a specific HTTP operation on a Resource.  This set of strings match zero or more strings in the PrivilegesUsed and OEMPrivilegesUsed properties.

PrivilegeRegistry.description: The PrivilegeRegistry schema describes the operation-to-privilege mappings.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Actions.description: The available actions for this Resource.
Actions.longDescription: This property shall contain the available actions for this Resource.

Mappings.description: The mappings between entities and the relevant privileges that access those entities.
Mappings.longDescription: This property shall describe the mappings between entities and the relevant privileges that access those entities.

OEMPrivilegesUsed.description: The set of OEM privileges used in this mapping.
OEMPrivilegesUsed.longDescription: This property shall contain an array of OEM privileges used in this mapping.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties that this object contains shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

PrivilegesUsed.description: The set of Redfish standard privileges used in this mapping.
PrivilegesUsed.longDescription: This property shall contain an array of Redfish standard privileges used in this mapping.

Target_PrivilegeMap.description: This type describes a mapping between one or more targets and the HTTP operations associated with them.
Target_PrivilegeMap.longDescription: This type shall describe a mapping between one or more targets and the HTTP operations associated with them.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

OperationMap.description: The mapping between the HTTP operation and the privilege required to complete the operation.
OperationMap.longDescription: This property shall contain the mapping between the HTTP operation and the privilege required to complete the operation.

Targets.description: The set of URIs, Resource types, or properties.
Targets.longDescription: This property shall contain the array of URIs, Resource types, or properties.  For example, `/redfish/v1/Systems/1`, `Manager`, or `Password`.  When the Targets property is not present, no override is specified.

title: #PrivilegeRegistry.v1_1_4.PrivilegeRegistry
